Quick search

Welcome to CerebUnit’s documentation!¶

CerebUnit is one of the four components for validating cerebellum models: two being CerebModels and CerebData, which does not require installation while CerebStats and CerebUnit require installation.

This is the documentation for the CerebTests component.

Contents:

  • How to run a validation test
    • 1. Load executive control
    • 2. Load dataset
    • 3. Load desired validation test
  • Available tests
    • Table of validation tests
  • Available Capabilities
    • Table of capabilities and capacities
